channel.title: Awesome on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Awesome on Butterfly Dream

item.title: Heroes Reborn Teaser
item.description: I know what people say about Heroes, and no I won’t link to them. Who cares, I loved that show. And sadto see some of the original cast won’t be (and glad about some, I hated Claire’s character) but seriously watch the teaser, DAMN! You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter

item.title: 50 Years of James Bond in Black Tie
item.description: What a really thourough investigation. Every single piece of clothing (no shoes sadly) calatalogued. The little nerd in me wants to do re-runs now (No Timothy Dalton, no way!). Though there are 28 dinner jackets, there are 29 shirts. George Lazenby wears two different ruffled shirts with the same dinner jacket in On Her Majestyâ€™s Secret Service. Also, shoes are unfortunately missing from this infographic since they are rarely seen in the films.

item.title: So you like Star Wars?
item.description: So they are looking for two roles: They are a “street smart and strong” orphaned girl in her late teens and a “smart capable” man in his late teens or early 20s. So let’s all go and audition for these roles? If only…. You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter
